name: First meeting in September

description: Following our first inspiring meeting on Sunday 12 September we have decided to meet again on the 30 October same time and same place.  We welcome new members to join us for a warm and stimulating afternoon.
name: Contact Kathryn at kathrynhendry@gmail.com or Tel: 024633827

description: Lets get together and meditate on this auspicious day 11.11.11. Connect with our divinity within and with our true nature of peace and light
name: 11.11.11 - Meditation

description:
Time for Change - Co-creating a Better World

Following our powerful meditation for[masked] we will explore using a stimulating workshop experience "a meditation & dialogue" where we aim to explore the importance of meditation, spiritual values and the contribution we can all made to restoring peace and harmony to this troubled world.

Workshop Facilitator Roos Nabben:  teacher of Raja Yoga Meditation for 25 years.   Roos she represents BKSA as partner and member of The Board of Advice in Nederland in Dialoog (The Netherlands in Dialogue), a national project to improve social cohesion amongst people. (www.nederlandindialoog.nl). She was a co-founder of this project when it started in 2001 after the 11th of September. Since then it has spread over Holland and abroad, also in Brussels.   VIHASA (Values in Health Care a spiritual Approach) is another project where she is involved as trainer and organizer.
how_to_find_us: (Brahma Kumaris) Bischoffsheimlaan 39, Flat 4c, Brussels 1000  (3 mins from Metro Botanique)
name: Join us for an exciting meditation workshop to folow our 11.11.11 meditation...

description:
Meditation and Movement, bringing together the position of the mind and the position of the body with some simple and relaxing meditations for the mind and relaxing yoga movements for the body.

Annamaria Ijkema, teacher of Hatha Yoga will lead the session.  All are welcome.
name: Radiant Mind - Radiant Body (bring your yoga mat...)

description:
Topic:  Silence - deep inner silence opens the pathways to spiritual self-discovery. 

 

But where can we find that silence in our noise-polluted world?  An afternoon to explore spiritual truths in a peaceful and uplifting environment.  Meditation, reflection, dialogue and lots more....

All are welcome
name: Silence ...... in our noise-polluted world?

description:
Each Wednesday join us for a free LUNCH TIME Booster...

Give yourself some time to re-energise and refresh over lunch.  Experience a unique combination of relaxation, workout and silence balancing body, mind and soul.

Join us for a free 30 mins drop-in session - boost up your energy and leave us refreshed and alert ....

We start on time and finish on time...

description: We express our deepest values through our relationships. Why not take time to consider what our existing relationships reflect about ourselves and to see them in a new light? A workshop of a different kind with lots of space for interaction and discussion.

description:
There is such a lot in the news about shifts in the global environment.  How are you managing shifts in your inner climate?  When relationships cool or situations get hot, how do you keep your inner thermostat stable?  An evening to explore and discuss.

Refreshments provided.

 

The event is free, but donations are welcome if you wish to support the venue etc.
name: Inner Climate Change.....

description:
Please note that we have had to change the date of this event due to unforseen circumstances, Sudesh Didi must stay in Inda longer than thought.   We plan to continue with the programme.  I have invited another very inspirational speakerJaymini Patel, Director and founder of BK Publications.com, one of the worlds best resources of spiritual books. Jayamini is an international speaker and teacher of meditation who has used in her practical life the principle "Think less, do MORE"  Apologies for this change.

 

A very special opportunity to hear from one of the worlds leading teachers of Raja Yoga Meditation. 

Hope you can join us.  The event will start around 19.15hr and finish 21.00

Refreshments will be provided.

The evening is free of charge and one not to be missed.
how_to_find_us: We are on the 4th Floor only a couple of minutes from the Metro Botanique
name: Think less, do MORE.... learn to still the mind and see the magic unfold

description:
Deepening the Experience

You are invited to explore spiritual topics and deepen your experience of meditation.  The evening will start with meditation and then an exploration of the topic with lots of space for discussion

 

This Friday we will explore:

Managing your Energy Levels

When life is busy or all your energy is focused on a a specific project its very easy to feel off balance !
name: Deepening the Experience

description:
Facilitator:  Dr Astrid Bendomir

Member of the Royal College of Obstetricians & Gynecologists, Surgical Fellow in Breast Surgery and Consultant Occupational Physician.

Astrid has also been a student and teacher of Raja Yoga Meditation for the past 13 years and in her spare time runs a Meditation Centre in Scotland.  She will share with us the wisdom she has acquired from her spiritual journey and how it is useful in daily life.

The Topic - House of mirrors to discover what is blocking our progress.

Spring is here and its time for a spring clean.  Most life coaches recommend clearing out cupboards and simplifying our diet, finances and daily timetable as the first step towards change.  However, sometimes the clutters is not just on a physical level, we can be carrying mental and emotional clutter as well.  During this afternoon we will explore our "house of mirrors" and discover what is blocking our progress.
name: De-Cluttering with a Difference

description:
A wonderful opportunity to hear a very inspiring individual - Linda leads self-development and meditations retreats in the south of England and for the past 30 years has been teaching meditation.  Linda is a valued speaker who travels to many countries sharing her depth of wisdom that opens doors on the spiritual journey.

 

Topic: Relationships ... are they in harmony?  Can we harmonise all relationships?  Yes it is possible!!!

it is said that "first impressions are last impressions" the fact is that the first impressions you have of someone is correct 79% of the time... some people have a "good vibe" and some don't!  Have you ever wondered why that is and how it works?  This evening is to explore how a spiritual approach can pour oil on to the ripples of life and help to heal and strengthen all our relationships.
name: Relationships are they in harmony?

description:
Our next seminar : our awareness has a big effect on our inner environment and also on our external environment, health, wealth and relationships...  With continuing demands there is a need to halt the energy drains, build energy capacity and to renew and recover our energy.

Speaker: Valerie Magnieux- for the past 8 years has been based inSouth East Asia co-ordinatingand facilitating values-based education groups with socially vulnerable people, this practical exposure has made her even more aware of the need to bring spiritualty into daily life.  Valerie is a student and teacher of Raja Yoga Meditation for 31 years, nowbased at the Brahma Kumaris, Lighthouse Retreat Centre in Worthing, England.
how_to_find_us: http://goo.gl/maps/ygqa
name: Consciousness & the Environment its all about energy

description:
http://photos2.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/4/1/6/6/event_141916742.jpegAn evening to explore a life free from pressure and worry.

Sis Denise has been researching the power of meditation since 1974, presenting over 200 television programmes on Raja Yoga meditation in the US and writing 10 text books for the Diploma Programmes in Education in Values and Spirituality, which is currently being offered in Hindi and English through Anamalai University, Chidambarum, India.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins from metro Botanique - ring door buzzer for Brahma Kumaris
name: Freedom from Pressure and Worry - talk & meditation experience

description:
http://photos1.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/5/b/9/c/event_151703452.jpegHappy to be me...  Workshop

How many of us can say we are happy with ourselves?  and to what extent am I happy just to be me?

The media portray many compelling images to entice us away from seeing and experiencing the true value of the self and often we go along with what others say of us, but what is the real "me" that I can connect to and fell happy with?  instead of living in stress and being confused! A workshop to explore issues that are relevant at this time.

Guest Speaker: Lousia Gupta has been delivering workshops and retreats on Self Esteem and Self Awareness for the past 10 years.  Louisa started her spiritual journey more than 30 years agao whilst living in India,  now based in Edinburgh, Scotland she co-ordinates retreats & events around the country.  Louisa's workshops are light and empowering.
how_to_find_us: 4th floor (Brahma Kumaris Buzzer)
name: Happy to be me... Workshop

description:
How to keep those loving feelings...!

How to maintain loving feelings in difficult times?   A still mind will help you concentrate allowing you to connect with that inner quality of love.  Its interesting to observe how love enables us to remove major obstacles and as a result our self-respect increases.

Rediscover the power of love regardless of the situations you have to face...

Speaker Karen Derks is a spiritual teacher from Holland.  Professionally working with people in conflict situations:  she understands the impact of a "negative spiral" in life.  The teachings of raja yoga meditation have given her many answers on developing and using that inner quality of love.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins from Metro Botanique - Brahma Kumaris door Buzzer, 4th Floor
name: How to keep those loving feelings...! Meditative self reflection & talk

description:
Giving time to the self is vital to improving the quality of life!

Step off the conveyor belt of life for one evening to reclaim a sense of clarity and well being. We will share some spiritual principles and learn some useful tools to experience inner calm.

Speaker: Roos Nabben, coordinates BKWSA in Rotterdam, she is a partner member of the board "Netherlands in Dialogue", a national project to improve social cohesion amongst people. (www.nederlandindialoog.nl).

Roos is co-founder of this project which started in 2001, after 9/11. Since then it has spread throughout the world, Brussels included. She is also involved in VIHASA (Values In HealthCare A Spiritual Approach). Professionally she is maternity nurse and lactation consultant.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins from Metro Botanique - Brahma Kumaris door Buzzer, 4th Floor
name: Power of well being - healthy mind, healthy body...

description:
http://photos2.meetupstatic.com/photos/event/a/6/1/a/event_181662522.jpegJoin us for a very inspiring event with Gopi Patel.  Since early 90's, she has over-seen the growth of the International Youth Forum (IYF) a global movement comprising a network of some 8,000 young adults (aged between 16 - 35) across 49 countries, whose main aim is to promote and facilitate the spiritual empowerment of young people.  In this capacity Gopi has spoken, facilitated and represented the IYF and Brahma Kumaris at global conferences and events, UN conferences related to youth and the Commonwealth Youth Forum.

During this event Gopi will guide us in exploring:
How to love without becoming hurt?
Why is receiving love as essential as giving it?
Join us to understand the philosophy of love and how to love from the heart...

 

 

More about the work of Gopi Patel,  She has initiated, co-ordinated and facilitated:

*  Seminars and retreat for the empowerment and dignity of young women
*  Intergenerational interfaith dialogues wtih young adults of varied faiths to promote greater communication, understanding and respect between generations and faith.

*  "Choose, Change, Become" - a training programme for young leaders - using varied methodologies in helping to extend the boundaries of young people's thinking and reflection into wider and deeper dimensions and building spiritual power

*  "The Feminine Renaissance" - a series of programmes bringing together women in leadership positions to explore a new paradigm of leadership based on spiritual principles.

*  "Global Executive Retreats" - a series of retreats for senior executives designed to deepen spiritual understanding as the basis of effective leadership.

*  "The Future of Power" dialogues - a series of conversations with global leaders, held in India, to raise the awareness of responsible leadership, explore the "shifts in power" and the impact of being a "trustee of power" in the 21 Century.
how_to_find_us: Very near the metro Botanique - 3mins
name: Living from the Heart..., open the heart and let love flow!

description:
Create a Vision Board for 2013.
We still have 6 places for anyone who would like to join this workshop.
This workshop is to take us on a journey into the future of our inner dreams, then bringing them into the open in the form of a "Vision Board", all will be explained.
REGISTRATION IS ESSENTIAL AS INFORMATION WILL BE SENT TO YOU BEFORE THE WORKSHOP TAKES PLACE.
A light vegetarian lunch will be provided.
how_to_find_us: Bischoffsheimlaan 39, 4th Floor (ring Brahma Kumaris Buzzer) we are 3mins from metro Botanique
name: Planting Powerful Seeds for 2013

description:
Clear guidance with Annemarie, from EVA, who promotes Judi Vegie in Brussels and throughout Belgium.

During this workshop your questions will be answered and you will discover how simple it actually is to bring about a change in your eating habits.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins from Metro Botanique - Brahma Kumaris door Buzzer, 4th Floor
name: Going Vegetarian in the New Year?  Need some guidance?

description:
Join us for an inspiring evening workshop with Claudia diving deeper into the "art of breathing".

 

 

We all BREATHE...  but, do we realize what this means to our well-being?  During this workshop Claudia will reveal to us the anatomy involved in breathing and help us explore our breathing patterns by which we can improve the quality of our breath and use it as a tool for relaxation, bringing vitality and health into our daily lives.

About Claudia: Claudia works as a Coach and Yoga Teacher in Brussels and abroad and deeply believes in yoga as a holistic science balancing body, mind and soul.
how_to_find_us: Bischoffsheimlaan 39, 4th Floor (ring Brahma Kumaris Buzzer) we are 3mins from metro Botanique
name: BREATHE...  you are alive!

description:
Today's society and cultures are waking up to the fact that more can be gained by "soft power" rather than from "aggressive in your face power" or the need to dominate...  In line with International Women's Day (8 March) we offer this workshop which is equally relevant to both men and women as we strive to gain the new "BALANCE" between SUCCESS and HAPPINESS...

Facilitator Roos Nabben is a workshop facilitator and teacher of meditation with many years experience and has changed the lives of many people in a positive and uplifting way.
how_to_find_us: Bischoffsheimlaan 39, 4th Floor (ring Brahma Kumaris Buzzer) we are 3mins from metro Botanique
name: Workshop - Is the future feminine?

description:
A residential retreat to reflect on where you are now and where you want to go and how you want to be

In today's stressful world there is a growing need for each of us to develop new tools and resources to deal with the challenges of life.  This retreat is designed to recharge the mind, body and spirit, with a series of stimulating seminars, talks, workshops, conversations, and meditation experiences.

There will be time for self-reflection, walks, light exercise, entertainment and more, all in delightful surroundings.  This retreat presents an ideal opportunity to step out of your busy life and take time for yourself and to uncover, nourish and strengthen your inner powers and develop strategies for success in your life and relationships.

The Retreat has limited space and is open to others outwith MeetUp, if you are interested then please contact me directly and I will forward further information.

The retreat facilitator is Mike George an author, spiritual teacher and motivational speaker.

The cost for the full weekend is
135 Euros this includes all meals, accommodation, workshops and activities.
how_to_find_us: 2 hrs from Brussels, please check Google maps (if you need help please get intouch)
name: Residential retreat - Strength, Success and Serenity

description:
Finding stability in a unstable world…!

Instability is the name of the game these days; you never know what’s going to happen next or what’s around the next corner.
So when all around you is falling to pieces, what is it that you hold on to? Where do you get that inner strength to draw from? How can you be so unshakeable that nothing disturbs your inner peace or shakes you?
Tonight’s speaker is an expert at stability - she travels constantly and never knows where she will be going next.

 

Speaker - Gopi Patel

Gopi is an international speaker and spiritual educator.  She has studied Raja Yoga meditation with the Brahma Kumaris for 28 years.  Gopi sees the erosion of spiritual values at the heart of the crises that the world is facing today, and works tirelessly to promote positive, human and spiritual values to all sectors of society.  Raised in Africa, and educated in the UK and India, she carries a blend of eastern spiritual wisdom and western education and culture.


We do not make charges for their seminars, workshops or retreats – voluntary contributions are gratefully accepted.
how_to_find_us: Bischoffsheimlaan 39, 4th Floor (ring Brahma Kumaris Buzzer) we are 3mins from metro Botanique
name: Become.... unshakable!

description:
Meditation helps to create new attitudes and responses to life, helping us to make the right choices in relationships, work and at home.
During this workshop we will share insights, methods and practical exercises to guide you towards a contented and enlightened lfestyle. This introduction day will give the experience of how to meditate and how to use meditation as a practical tool in your daily life.
Experience peace, inner strength and wisdom through "yoga for the mind"


Light vegetarian lunch provided - registration is essential
name: One Day introduction to Raja Yoga Meditation

description:
Peace is something I'm sure we all know and have experienced - even if it is for just a few moments. We will reconnect and rediscover the experience fo peace that we know so well and learn how to take the peace with us into our daily lives.
This workshop is somethinge for everyone to enjoy - it's an opportunity to create some more peace in our daily lives, with our families, our communities, country or region.
name: Peace Experience Workshop

description:
An opportunity to meet Sis Jayanti, a world spiritual leader, author, speaker and teacher of meditation.

Sis Jayanti, will be with us in Brussels for this specail event, at the Sheraton Hotel.  She will guide us into the experience of inner harmony with guided meditations and spiritual wisdom.  Look forward to seeing you there.

Living well within the limits of our planet...!

An evening to see ourselves and our world differently and ask the questions you have always wanted to ask! Hear about the power of the mind from an expert teacher of meditation / positive thinking and a global personality whose guidance of a spiritual nature can be seen on TV / media around the globe.  During this evening we will see how our relationships, life and world is influenced by our inner system:

Sister Jayanti, Director of the Brahma Kumaris Europe & Middle East, with over 40 years experience is a spiritual expert on the living system of thought and how it impacts the living system of matter, in dialogue with Joachim Golo Pilz, an entrepreneur in the field of solar power and alternative energy forms.
name: Living well withing the limits of our planet...!

description: Sometimes we are overwhelmed by all the things happening in the world, and feel a little helpless and wonder what contribution can I make...? However everything begins with one individual, I can change my understanding of what is happening in the world today within a moment and start creating instead of destroying....
name: Workshops and Exhibition - Exactly Who is Responsible

description: We already have the technology to live in true harmony wit nature, but these technologies are unlikely to solve our problems until those of us in a position to choose, make the choice for simpler lives motivated by kindness and compassion for the Earth. In the spirit of allowing time for realization of new perspectives, we offer this workshop that will help us to connect more deeply to both our authentic self and the Earth's needs in order to impact sustainable lifestyle choices.
name: Workshop & Exhibition - Earth Care

description:
An evening to explore and understand in a better way the power of the Subconscious Mind.

Guest Speaker: Vasanti Patel, from London.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins from Metro Botanique - Brahma Kumaris door Buzzer, 4th Floor

Legends and myths carry a timeless wisdom within their rich symbolism that even today can help us deal with the complexities of everyday life. In this workshop explore what lies beneath the ancient Celtic stories and rediscover your latent warrior virtues and powers….

"Whatever I think is what I feel, whatever I feel is how my world looks to me...."    discover the art of constructive thinking with Hans Haiert, Munich (Environmental Lawyer)

This Tuesday we will have a different format to our meditation evening, starting at 19.00 with meditation, followed by a talk.  Hans is an environmental lawyer, meditation teacher and trainer for personal development with more than 20 years experience.  An evening to explore the "Art of Constructive Thinking"

This evening is offered Free of Charge, if you wish to make a donation to help with future events then you are most welcome to do so.

Pleine Conscience, Plein Puissance

On the 3rd Sunday of each month many people around the world come together to offer their vibratons of peace to the world.   Join with us and people in over 120 countries for this hour of meditation.

name: Apologies this event cancelled.. awarness the key to inner freedom!

description:
Join us for this unique opportunity to explore with an expert our “personal identity, purpose and direction”.

Maria Moreno; Professor of Management at the University of Valencia (Spain).

Her research interests are the human side of Quality Management, Learning and Innovation, as well as Cultural Change in Organizations. She has published books about these subjects and numerous articles in academic journals as the British Journal of Management; International Journal of Manpower; Industrial Management and Data System;  Management Decision; Total Quality Management & Business Excellence; Quality Management Journal (ASQ); Management Research; International Journal of Quality & Reliability Management; and The Journal of General Management, between others. She has directed nine Ph theses and eight competitive research projects on these topics.

She has been involved as a volunteer with the Brahma Kumaris since 1992. She has given numerous lectures and seminars on personal development and values ​​education as part of this collaboration of social volunteering. The topics include how to develop personal excellence, quality relationships, values ​​and teamwork, successful cooperation, overcoming and preventing stress, the role of calm and positivity in welfare personal relationships, and integrity and consistency in personal and organizational development.

She meditates regularly since 1992 and she also teaches Raja Yoga meditation. Nowadays she participates in the national coordination team of Brahma Kumaris in Spain.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins from Metro Botanique
name: Personal Identity, Purpose and Direction...

description:
This workshop will explore “the key to achievement in personal excellence”.  How many of us set goals, make plans but sometimes things dont always workout as we planned...  During this afternoon we have the wonderful opportunity to explore this topic with Maria Moreno; Professor of Management at the University of Valencia (Spain).

Her research interests are the human side of Quality Management, Learning and Innovation, as well as Cultural Change in Organizations. She has published books about these subjects and numerous articles in academic journals as the British Journal of Management; International Journal of Manpower; Industrial Management and Data System;  Management Decision; Total Quality Management & Business Excellence; Quality Management Journal (ASQ); Management Research; International Journal of Quality & Reliability Management; and The Journal of General Management, between others. She has directed nine Ph theses and eight competitive research projects on these topics.

She has been involved as a volunteer with the Brahma Kumaris since 1992. She has given numerous lectures and seminars on personal development and values ​​education as part of this collaboration of social volunteering. The topics include how to develop personal excellence, quality relationships, values ​​and teamwork, successful cooperation, overcoming and preventing stress, the role of calm and positivity in welfare personal relationships, and integrity and consistency in personal and organizational development.

She meditates regularly since 1992 and she also teaches Raja Yoga meditation. Nowadays she participates in the national coordination team of Brahma Kumaris in Spain.
name: Personal Excellence and Quality in Relationships

description: Nurture yourself with quiet time guided lunchtime meditation..

description: Step off the conveyor belt of life and reconnect with yourself once again - recharge you inner self to reconnect with you once again. An opportunity to see yourself and everyone else in a different light.
name: Yoga for the mind... stretch and enlighten your mind!

description:
When your computer gets stuck or takes too long to load the programme you just re-boot it and it seems to do the job!
When it comes to life and things get stuck we sometimes get filled with hopelessness and despair, but if we can apply the same method to our lives and just re-boot, then a shift takes place and gets us going again. Lets explore this individual "re-boot".
name: Re-boot your life

description: Nurture yourself with quiet time guided lunchtime meditation..
name: Exploring Silence and Me Time...

description: Nurture yourself with quiet time guided lunchtime meditation..
name: Exploring Silence and Me Time...

description:
I meditate - everyone meditates...  The first thing is to forget all that one knows about meditation.  Meditation is easy and natural.  Meditation makes me feel light and free.  Meditation helps me de-stress.  Meditation opens me up to life and to those around me.

There is no need to travel to far-off exotic places.  Already, in the fourth centrury before Christ, in the cradle of civilisation, Zeno of Citum advocated meditation in his school of the Painted Porch.  Nothing new under the sun...

Speaker:  Benoit Duche, Born and raised in France, Beniot lived in New York in the early eighties, where he was an innovative manager and entrepreneur in French haute couture.   He has shot and directed several films for UNESCO about education and AIDS n Africa and also created the "Values based Micro Credit" (VBMC) in Congo DRC.  He is author of a number of books linked to meditation.
how_to_find_us: 3 mins metro Botanique
name: I meditate....

description: Sustainable transitions demands a new mindset... and the "call of time" is aking for a profound shift in awareness - a shift in thinking that is creating our curent crises. So what is the shift in awareness that can ease the transition to the vision we hold? What is the vision?
name: New Thinking Creates New Realities

description:
We can see that sustainable transitions demands a new mindset! So what is the shift in awareness that can ease the transitions towards the vision we hold!
A very special event with Jayanti Kirpilani, Directof the Brahma Kumaris Europe and Middle Ease. With over 40 years experience she is a spiritual expert on how the quality of thought impacts the quality of matter in all domains....
name: World in Transition - New Thinking Creates New Realities...

description:
Take time to reach an inner place of silence ad you will notice the difference allowing your mind to still and prepare for whatever is to come next.

1 hour of guided meditation, with music and silent pauses...  Relax and unwind ready for the week ahead.

Please do arrive before 18:30 as the meditation will start on time for those who wish to stay longer we will explore our experiences together.

description:
The term "spirituality" in our society needs to gain respectability. It is often wrongly associated with religion...  Spirituality and brain research demonstrate more and more convergence. During this short interactive workshop you will discover the common developent path of our consciousness. This workshop is facilitated by a dear friend of the Brussels Reflection Group and one of our best supporters:

Jean Debrosse - Excellence Consulting sprl

·  What is spirituality as seen by scientists?

·  How does spirituality and elevated consciousness manifest?

·  When does true spirituality emerge during life time, and what are the conditions?

·  What is facilitating and limiting our development?

·  How do we spend most of our time in inner conflict
how_to_find_us: Nearest Metros Madu and Botanique (Botanique is the nearest)
name: Spirituality through a scientific lens...

description:
Its all about Relationships.... with who? Self, others, nature....

In the world we live in today its true that everything is about relationships with myself, others, nature... how can I manage all of these in a way that keeps me happy and others happy with me too?

Imagine if we are the creators of our own destiny then by understanding our own thoughts, feelings and actions, we can change our relationships for the better… During this seminar Maureen will help us explore ways to move forward towards living a more fulfilling life and developing better relationships. During the evening there will be reflections and meditations that can help us in our relationships...


Maureen Goodman, is one of the pioneers of the Brahma Kumaris’ work in the UK and has been at the hub of major events and initiatives in the UK and around the world since the 1980s. She is based at Global Co-operation House as UK Programme Director and is actively involved in the community outreach work of the Brahma Kumaris including, interfaith, youth work, prison work and healthcare. She travels widely giving workshops and talks on spiritual development, injecting them with an engaging combination of humour and depth.
name: It's All About Relationships...

description: An evening of meditation with Maureen Goodman, Programme Director of the Brahma Kumaris. An hour to deep into the experience of peace and stillness, guided by an yogi with over 36 years experience.
how_to_find_us: Metro Botanique
name: Inner Peace, Inner Calm
